Articles.Content: As you can see from the title, this thread will have people posting the transcripts, or at least what was discussed, of past streams so KSP fans who can't watch the streams can learn what happened. For example, since I can't watch the streams(if only I could turn the archive quality down 720 px!), users might post transcripts of Squadcast 1, 2, and 3. This counld continue with any new Squadcasts. I just wanted to do this to help those with little time, a bad internet connection, or those who spend their free time playing KSP(Like me!).
